SelectionDef.Value: Reduction required due to prior NRSA support

QuestionDef.QText: Summary Statement review of human subjects:
All related correspondence and concurrence from OEP/OER/NIH to remove bar:
OEP/OER/NIH approval memo to issue restricted award attached?
Gender Code needs to be changed from summary statement or assigned?
Minority Code needs to be changed from summary statement or assigned?
Children Code needs to be changed from summary statement or assigned?
The Fellow's Institution has approved human subjects assurance?
Date PI referred to OHRP website:
Performance site(s) other than grantee engaged in research involving human subjects?
Does performance site(s) have approved assurance(s)?
Is the project viable if the site(s) does not receive assurance?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: (If No, award will be held for assurance and IRB approval)

QuestionDef.QText: Date PI referred to OHRP website:
Summary Statement review of animal welfare:
All related correspondence and concurrence from OLAW to remove bar
OLAW approval memo to issue restricted award attached?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: (If no approval, award will be held.)

(Award will be held until all sites have assurance or OLAW approval received for restricted award. Grantee must have an assurance even if all research involving live vertebrate animals is at other performance sites.) http://grants2.nih.gov/grants/olaw/assurance/300index.htm

QuestionDef.QText: Are there other performance site(s) other than awardee engaged in animal research?
Does performance site(s) have approved assurance(s)?

QuestionDef.QInstructions: (Award will be held until all sites have assurance or OLAW approval received for restricted award.)

QuestionDef.QText: If site does not receive assurance, will project still be viable?
Does this project use Human Embryonic Stem Cells (hESC)?
Is hESC use appropriate for this project?
Are cell lines listed on the hESC Registry?

QuestionDef.QInstructions: (If Yes, informational term will be used.)

QuestionDef.QText: Has CSR received an amendment to this application?
Has amended application been reviewed by IRG?
Is the Fellow training at a foreign institution?
Date Entered into Foreign Tracking System:
Did the application go the the NCAB special review for approval?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If no, award must be held.
If No, award will be held.

SelectionDef.Value: Yes, domestic grant with foreign involvement

QuestionDef.QText: Date Entered into Foreign Tracking System:

QuestionDef.QInstructions: If No, award will be held.

QuestionDef.QText: Are there any other program concerns, not covered above, that should be resolved prior to issuing an award?
Is the Fellow's contact information on the face page?
Is the 'Training in Responsible Conduct of Research Plan' approved by IRG?
Has an acceptable plan been received from the grantee?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If no, an explanation is required.

SelectionDef.Value: Yes, approved and sent to OGA

QuestionDef.QText: Are there any publications cited in the Progress Report Summary that appear not to be in compliance with the NIH Public Access Policy?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: Answer Yes if one or more publications appear not to be in compliance. Although the dates suggest that the publication(s) fall under the Public Access policy, none of the acceptable IDs or indications is provided (PMCID, NIHMSID, or "PMC Journal - In Process"). Answer No if either all publications appear to be in compliance OR there are no publications reported.

QuestionDef.QText: Has the Public Access notification e-mail been sent to the PI and Business Official?
Please attach the e-mail message to the greensheet:
